documents.document: Our new house is now unconditional! So exciting.
So @jemyoshioka suggested Olivia Coleman for the new #DoctorWho and I am so behind this suggestion.
@Megapope @Styla73 @insopherable I've sorted this fyi :)
@insopherable @Megapope oh god can you dm me where your new job is? You should have proper colour booklets not poor quality B&W photocopies!

@dimsie @meganjwhelan that would be my best guess too.
Look at this amazing card that @jemyoshioka drew for my work farewell morning tea! So wonderful. https://t.co/rvzlXhb3Dx
Disgraceful and spineless stuff here from English. I'd call him a joke, but nothing about this is funny. Just pathe… https://t.co/VW1PkLpHRb
@aaronincognito yep if you join online at https://t.co/s5k43PyWeW you'll get the info you need :)
@Megapope @aaronincognito @NZPSA @bootstheory hope that helps!
@Megapope @aaronincognito @NZPSA @bootstheory which may end up being an easier way to join if they're being problematic about it.
@Megapope @aaronincognito @NZPSA @bootstheory but if they can't work out processing (which they should be able to) you can do an AP instead
@Megapope @aaronincognito @NZPSA @bootstheory if you call 0508 367 772 during office hours, they'll be able to give you more specific advice
@Megapope @aaronincognito @NZPSA @bootstheory if the latter then the former might not be able to sort it. But you can still be a member.
@Megapope @aaronincognito @NZPSA @bootstheory are you being paid by the agency you're doing the work for, or a recruitment/placement agency?
Shit this is tense #NZvAUS
Go the mighty @BLACKCAPS! Great start #NZvAUS
Sitting at my desk insulting guinea pigs to @jemyoshioka but apparently not loud enough to get a reaction from @bootstheory. Will try harder
@gtiso go to https://t.co/vLnWPK69ip and register an account. When they ask for credit card, instead at bottom input code & then you're done
@Pseudony_Ms the benefit of having two screens!
Free Sky fan pass for the cricket today! Use the code BLACKCAPS. Work today has improved significantly. https://t.co/CRTlBMaHyW
This is simply wonderful. Bravo! https://t.co/3O30SsG47f
Brave Smudge was very excited to see us on our way to work this morning. First time we've seen it this year! https://t.co/dFNMApxxEe
@_Techius @grumpybirb @Pno_nwa oh do fuck off. Blocked.
Hidden Figures is really bloody wonderful.
@laranitaNZ up a valley from Owhiro Bay, at the start of the Red Rocks trail.
Went back to our favourite South Coast spot, possibly for the last time before we move to the Kapiti Coast. So pret… https://t.co/dRNNj97t5C
@manateeidle you know our story if that's the sort of thing you're looking for?
Elsa found a little comfy hidey place in the corner of the spare room https://t.co/XNPWIlirG6
@LewSOS 25 Oct 2006, in the Dom Post. Before Prosser was an MP, though given 'wogistan' hard to say new job tempered his beliefs much.
@kumararepublic there is absolutely no chance that he'll succeed Winston.
@verbscape yeah for sure. Cheering is great though IMO - but it's quite different from the sort of bravado which I'm also seeing a lot.
@alans_world their current incarnation (right wing resistance) is still many of the same losers, still failing to make new friends.
@alans_world yep they were. Thanks to several things (inc. lots of antifa activity online & offline) they mostly went away after a few years
@gurrlwithacurl thanks. It's a long time (10ish years) ago now, I don't think back on it much. But with recent news...
@gurrlwithacurl oh that's barely even scratching the surface. It was a time. Not a fun time, but a time.
But nazis will build their response based on the threat they think they face. And it probably won't come back on you.
But I, for one, have had enough of people talking like they're already regularly punching nazis. Most of us aren't, won't, can't. That's ok!
I'm not saying everyone should dedicate their lives to antifa action.We've all got to live & there's plenty of other issues worth working on
So either put up and do your best to make sure fascists can't organise, or stop talking about it as though you are.
As a Jewish lefty who has had neo-nazis literally piss on my mother's grave (and send me photos of it), & try to run me over, it isn't fun.
I'm all for punching nazis, but also think about who is gonna feel the worst of the blow back if you're talking a big, but empty, game.
@alans_world as well, I also cut out this page from that day's paper, handwrote the date on it, and took this photo. But thanks anyway.
@alans_world Hi Alan. No, it wasn't. This letter is from 2006. I would know. I was one of the organisers of the anti-fascist protest.
@DearMama_ Steven Universe is wonderful and heart-warming and beautiful
@Eliana0Buchanan ugh. I've never met the dude but know a bunch who know him and thought he might be ok
@tui_talk @MsAnna_Jane Anna do you want to book now? I'm a little preoccupied with beer
@tui_talk maybe! @MsAnna_Jane do we have time for this?
Making beer on a sunny Saturday afternoon https://t.co/Ge2s9Ku9PU
@pr0gger @reckonsemoji yep that's right, just after the National Front's march in Wellington on Labour Day

@genuinelygreat @simonjtapp @thelittlepakeha @MsAnna_Jane this sounds like my dream

@thelittlepakeha @MsAnna_Jane remember who? What's twitter? Who am I? All I know is home ownership. Leverage. Mortgage rates. Sub prime loan

@DoctorJeph @ShakingStick oh woops missed that bit. I stand corrected
@DoctorJeph @ShakingStick it's more pay, isn't it?
@gtiso @mstevnz interesting! I'm not sure where I picked it up from tbh but I've used it for years. Looks the neatest to my eyes.
@gtiso @mstevnz my preferred style is semi-colon after each, full stop after the last.
@scoutriver @jemyoshioka @Megapope I did 3rd form art (I think I got a C), no higher education required, just good instincts.
@jemyoshioka @Megapope We had to make a new group join form in your absence, Dan. Jem and I worked really hard, hop… https://t.co/Qe7qQx31WI
The awesome @LI_politico talking to the awesome @SusieFergusonNZ on the awesome @NZMorningReport. So much awesome! https://t.co/8C8MbqQcyA
Smudgey is very sad that we're going to work today, she did her very best to try to convince me to stay at home. https://t.co/jxRgSn085x
@runningwhio @MsAnna_Jane ordered online from https://t.co/5nhTcZ615r. Hope it works for your kitty!
@thelittlepakeha I'm so confused right now. @MsAnna_Jane is uncontrollable laughter next to me.
@MatthewHootonNZ no, I avoid proto-fascism on principle. Besides, you of all people should know the difference between rhetoric and reality.
This is possibly the reachiest reach I've ever seen Hoots reach. https://t.co/NoUTvQlXhv
@_kellydare @MsAnna_Jane nice to see you too! Have a great day 2
@MsAnna_Jane @gurrlwithacurl I was curious as to why you'd tweeted us with nothing but our own handles.
@raena In hindsight, it's interesting how huge those albums were amongst people my age despite the fact we had no idea what Triple J was.
@raena oh I had the album from that year's countdown! So many great tracks.
Quote is from the Conservative Party announcing their new leader, who wants you to know he likes his family. https://t.co/L1b5aeBj1g
"His philosophy is, if it isn’t broken, don’t try fixing it, but if it is broken, then fix it." Now that's inspiring politics.
I wrote (most of) a thing. https://t.co/dWqyhLDQzL
@simonpnz @MsAnna_Jane @Styla73 had lots of help from great mortgage advisor & lawyer. Feeling pretty confident but will have to wait & see.
@pepperraccoon @MsAnna_Jane @simonpnz @Styla73 nope, there's at least one other.
@simonpnz @MsAnna_Jane @Styla73 deadline private treaty, which I'd never heard of until late last year but seems to be very common now.
This Cat(an) is looking pretty settled now. https://t.co/EWNXVv5Zpo
Elsa is scoping out the board, trying to decide on her opening move. https://t.co/6BE2bNCcCi
@LaurieFleming @Katieshould @jgmccl whereas everything I've tasted at Beach House (probs about half the brunch menu) has been outstanding.
@LaurieFleming @Katieshould @jgmccl yep it's my new favourite cafe. The last time I went to The Bach, I couldn't finish my coffee or my food
@jgmccl @Katieshould so many dogs! Also Queen Sally's Diamond Deli is really worth trying for deliciousness. Owned by same folk as Maranui.
@Katieshould @jgmccl (I've lived in both Kilbirnie and Lyall Bay, both really lovely communities)
@Katieshould @jgmccl Elements have new owners now but it's still pretty decent - the old owners & chef now run Beach House in Owhiro Bay.
@insopherable congrats on both of these things!
Found this excellent kitty waiting for a bus in Kingston. I hope it knows public holidays mean Sunday timetables! https://t.co/UAyBwZz9qJ
@thebibliophile9 it's ok, the good politics have always been on my mum's side of the family. That's the side I'm closest to.
@thebibliophile9 it was my father's. I think he was given it but not sure who by. He did vote Act in '96 I think though, unfortunately.
@CnrJoe only by Richard Prebble unfortunately, so nope.
@nzdodo @MsAnna_Jane @KaroriBee I don't like any part of it, but then I don't really like lamps in general so I'm not the target audience!
Are you the sort of person who wants an autographed Richard Prebble book? Then there's something wrong with you https://t.co/jzdwzvcthR
@MsAnna_Jane @KaroriBee Unfortunately one of the things that's easier to see in the dark when the lamp is on is the lamp.
